summary.text: Personal org app listing blocked by Fly.io GraphQL authentication failure

errors.message: You must be authenticated to view this.

required_manual_action.step: CEO must update FLY_API_TOKEN secret in GitHub repository settings
required_manual_action.reference: See docs/FLY_TOKEN_ACTION_REQUIRED.md for token regeneration steps
required_manual_action.conditional_purge: Cannot proceed with personal org purge until Fly authentication is resolved

purge_plan.note: Even if confirmation was provided, cannot execute purge without valid Fly token

next_action: Resolve Fly authentication before attempting personal org operations
